item.title: How GitLens enhanced my commits
item.description: I’ve been using GitLens on VS Code since always! The reason I Installed GitLens is being one of the most popular and recommended extensions on the marketplace. But recently I’ve noticed how its current line blame feature has made my whole committing process much better. Of course, I knew about Git blame long before even GitLens came into existence. Although it’s a great tool to exploit git history, It’s not handy and easy to use and so it’s not commonly used.
